about-text-1: Hi! My name is Jorge Humberto Gonz√°lez Ramos, I'm 19 years old and I currently live in Guadalajara, Mexico. I am currently studying Computer Engineering at the University Center for Exact Sciences and Engineering (CUCEI in spanish) from Universidad de Guadalajara.
about-text-2: My interest in programming was created in my childhood with video games, gamemodding was my beginning, however my professional experience started recently in 2019.
about-text-3: My experience focuses on web-development, both front-end and back-end with the enthusiasm of using the latest and best technologies available.
about-text-4: My main goal is to take advantage of my skills and focus on creating new tools and solutions for every type of user.
experience-text: Mainly I have worked with python and javascript, however as a hobby and study I have also learned languages such as c, c ++, c # and scripting languages. Click on the icon to see the technologies I use.
exp-react: Creation of differents websites and applications, webs.
exp-flask: API building, interactive websites, use of websockets.
work-desc: These are some of the projects I have worked on.
work1-1: Sophii is a multi-featured Discord bot with twitch alerts, levels, and more. It is done in python using discord.py as the API Wrapper. It has a user panel made in React
work1-2: This site was built to show a bit what I do and to practice a bit more typescript and react.
work3-1: This mod is dedicated to adding building elements to the game, chopping wood, mining and construction, cabins, customization and more.
work4-1: The objective of this library is to scrape Twitter without using its official API.
work4-2: This is a simple game, it was created to test pygame.
work4-3: This project is a school one, I used scapy for packet capture, sanic as server and react as interface.
